LanguageData.SkavenScenario.scenario.label: Skaven clan
LanguageData.SkavenScenario.scenario.description: A group of skaven leave from the Under-Empire with some stolen warpstone batteries and a cannon. Set on raising their clans name above the rest they build their own hold out on the Rimworld.
LanguageData.SkavenScenario.scenario.summary: A group of skaven set out to build their own clan hold.
LanguageData.SkavenScenario.scenario.parts.14.text: You stand on unkown ground together with your followers, with the stolen batteries and the cannon at hand.
